result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

COURT notes SPD has filed a report and is still looking for counsel.
COURT to set one more review hearing prior to moving this matter back to the responsible branch.
COURT finds good cause to toll time limits until next hearing.

INCLUDES 22CF1226, 22CF1227, 22CF1228:  No contact with co-defendants Desmariegh Meyer, Casey Pedersen, Hannah Siemers or Nou Yang; no contact with children in residence J.A.J. or L.A.K.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons. Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol / controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

ADDRESS INFO for Kyle J. Pedersen

Date and time set for initial appearance on all cases; VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction.  Deft on PO hold.

- No contact with co-defts; Desmariegh Meyer, Casey Pedersen, Hannah Siemers or Nou Yang. 
- No contact with children in residence; J.A.J. or L.A.K. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
